thread.section_title: Homeadvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homeadvisor | www.homeadvisor.com | 8 of 385
thread.title: Linda

author: Linda
title: Linda
text: We wanted our tile floors cleaned and three vendors gave us estimates. The one we used, Lenny Alese, came to the house and measured the job and gave us a price before he left. The other two vendors gave us Quote: s over the phone based on my estimate of size. Turns out my estimate was way too high! Had the other vendors came out and measured, perhaps they would have been comparable estimates. Either way, I'm pretty sure we would have used Lenny Alese because of his personality and his overall demeanor.
